item.title: Why Start Blogging?
item.description: Because why not? :) … Ok, ok, this deserves better explanation since this is my first blog post. I’ve recently left all social networks to protect my own sanity and privacy. The only socials media I’m currently using is Nostr which is more community than a social network (at least for now). Nostr serves very well my occasional short “twetts” but sometimes I feel an urge to share something longer to read.
